description: A synthetic dataset designed to model the relationship between climate change variables and agricultural economic impacts. The dataset simulates real-world patterns of how climate variations affect agricultural productivity and resulting economic consequences across different regions and farming conditions.

original_source.creator: Unknown (Synthetic Dataset)
original_source.publication: None identified - appears to be created for educational/research purposes

columns.name: Temperature_Change
columns.semantic_description: Average temperature deviation from historical baseline in degrees Celsius

columns.name: Precipitation_Change
columns.semantic_description: Percentage change in annual precipitation compared to historical average

columns.name: Extreme_Weather_Events
columns.semantic_description: Number of extreme weather events (droughts, floods, storms) per year

columns.name: Soil_Quality_Index
columns.semantic_description: Composite measure of soil health including organic content, pH, and nutrient levels

columns.name: Crop_Diversity_Index
columns.semantic_description: Measure of agricultural biodiversity in the region

columns.name: Irrigation_Access
columns.semantic_description: Percentage of agricultural land with irrigation access

columns.name: Technology_Adoption_Level
columns.semantic_description: Index of modern agricultural technology implementation

columns.name: Farm_Size_Hectares
columns.semantic_description: Average size of farming operations in the region

columns.name: Growing_Season_Length
columns.semantic_description: Number of days suitable for crop growth annually

columns.name: Market_Access_Score
columns.semantic_description: Measure of farmers' ability to reach markets and sell produce

columns.name: Farmer_Education_Level
columns.semantic_description: Average years of formal education among farmers

columns.name: Adaptation_Investment
columns.semantic_description: Annual investment in climate adaptation measures

columns.name: Insurance_Coverage
columns.semantic_description: Percentage of farms with climate-related insurance

columns.name: Previous_Year_Impact
columns.semantic_description: Economic impact from climate events in previous year

target_description.name: Economic_Impact_Million_USD
target_description.meaning: Projected economic impact of climate change on agricultural production
target_description.range: Likely negative to positive values, representing losses and gains

dataset_history: This appears to be a synthetic dataset created to simulate the complex relationships between climate change and agricultural economics. It incorporates various factors known to influence agricultural resilience and productivity in the face of climate change, based on established research in agricultural economics and climate science.
inference_notes: As a synthetic dataset, it may not capture all real-world complexities and local variations. The relationships between variables are likely based on simplified models of known climate-agriculture interactions. Users should consider that actual climate impacts can be more complex and region-specific. The dataset appears designed for educational purposes and preliminary modeling rather than definitive policy decisions.
